links.name: Biofeedback

links.name: Blackout
links.description: Biofeedback damage taken and received matrix damage also goes to stun damage

links.description: +1 bonus to attack attribute

links.description: +4 to resist damage from data bombs

links.name: Demolition
links.description: +1 rating to data bombs set

links.name: Exploit
links.description: +2 sleaze attribute when Hack on the Fly

links.name: Fork
links.description: Matrix action on two targets. Same roll for both. Each defend separately.

links.name: Guard
links.description: Reduces extra damage by 1 per mark

links.name: Hammer
links.description: Matrix damage dealt adds +2 DV

links.name: Lockdown
links.description: Cauusing damage to persona is link-locked

links.name: Mugger
links.description: Damage by marks increased 1DV per mark

links.name: Shell
links.description: +1 dice to resist both matrix and biofeedback

links.name: Sneak
links.description: +2 dice pool to defend against trace user actions. GOD converge don't get physical location

links.name: Stealth
links.description: +1 Sleaze

links.name: Track
links.description: +2 data processing on trace icon actions. If target on sneak, negates +2 pool

links.name: Wrapper
links.description: Can set any icon. Matrix Perception test can detect if suspicious
